State.Description: Light and dark themes for Mod Organizer 2 that focus on a clean and modern design.
State.Name: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer 2 - Light and Dark

State.Author: DeadPool2099
State.Description: This mod will add a completely remastered version of 12.7mm pistol aka SigSauer P127 to Commonwealth, made especially for Fallout 4 with new models textures and modifications
State.Name: 12.7mm Pistol (Sig Sauer P127)

State.Author: Victor Tomioka and Bwones
State.Description: 12.7mm SMG with Level List Integration, 1st and 3rd Person animations including Power Armour.
State.Name: 12.7mm SMG

State.Author: asXas
State.Description: A pack of the weapons I've made so far.
State.Name: A Bundle of Tape - A weapons pack

State.Author: Diacute
State.Description: My attempt at making backpack mods as consistent as I can, revolving around Backpacks of the Commonwealth - LITE
State.Name: A Scavver's New World - Backpack Rebalances - DiaEdit

State.Author: FlashyJoeR
State.Description: The next iteration of Advanced Needs, coded from the top-down, to bring the best of AN2 and Fallout 76's many survival systems, with the same level of control over the systems as you are used to.
State.Name: Flashy(JoeR) - Advanced Needs 76

State.Author: Nova Subleader and i_code_i
State.Description: The return of one of the rarest weapons in gaming, the American 180 is a .22 submachine gun that appeared in Fallout: New Vegas as the Silenced .22 SMG is now in Fallout 4 with a modern twist!
State.Name: American 180 - .22 Submachine Gun

State.Author: Elianora - CaptainUltima
State.Description: A small military bunker under Wicked Shipping Fleet Lockup that comes with some serious goodies, as Sturges would say. Functions as a workshop, send your people there, comes with a custom power armour paint job and a camo hazmat suit. Other functionality available, too!
State.Name: Army Bunker player home and settlement

State.Author: esteva2103
State.Description: A new animation set for the quote "Assault Rifle". First and 3rd person.
State.Name: Assault Rifle Reanimated

State.Author: esteva2103
State.Description: A new animation set for the quote "Assault Rifle". First and 3rd person.
State.Name: Assault Rifle Reanimated

State.Author: Kris Takahashi
State.Description:
The Tales from the Commonwealth mod adds quests and companions. 

The Atomic Radio mod adds a radio station. 

The Settlers of the Commonwealth mod adds settlers with interesting dialogue.  



Go to 3dnpc.com for details.
State.Name: Atomic Radio and Tales from the Commonwealth

State.Author: BmanBlazer
State.Description: This mod adds a brand new Backpack system to the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Backpacks of the Commonwealth

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: A small plugin that exposes some new data to other mods, and fixes a few bugs.
State.Name: Baka Framework

State.Author: Rcollpc
State.Description: Adds a skill system similar to previous games. Also makes some changes to the perk chart.
State.Name: Be Exceptional - Skills and Perk Overhaul

Original.Name: Better Lootable Vehicles of the Commonwealth-61702-1-0-2-1658271158.7z

State.Author: Instant Hero aka Vegawagon350
State.Description: PRP Friendly Lootable Vehicles in the Commonwealth, Far Harbor and Nuka World
State.Name: Better Lootable Vehicles of the Commonwealth

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Your Power Armor will now fully absorb the damage of ballistic and laser weapon types.

Each armor part will work individually and absorb the damage of the body part it covers.

When one power armor part breaks, only this body part that was covered will take damage.

Keep your power armor in a good state and it will protect you.
State.Name: Better Power Armor - Redux

State.Author: BetaVirus
State.Description: This mod improves performance (FPS) in Boston and surrounding area. External areas only. This mod is beneficial to anyone that roams the boston area with mods that disable previs or break precombines in the boston area.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - aka BostonDT PreVis-PreCombine

State.Author: Valyn81 and BenRierimanu
State.Description: ESP Replacer for BostonFPSFix with PRP patches applied on top.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - PRP Edition

State.Author: Silverfox600
State.Description: Version 2.4 Features newly made spruce trees along with scots pine, new grasses and 3d LODs.
State.Name: Boston Natural Surroundings

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Campsite is a simple, lightweight camping mod that adds craftable / carryable tents, sleeping bags (new HD textures!), dog beds, fires, lanterns, and cooking pot, each with their own unique dynamics, sounds, interactivity.  Simple enough for light play, detailed enough to make you feel involved. VR-friendly.
State.Name: Campsite - Simple Wasteland Camping (and HD Sleeping Bags)

State.Author: TheFriedturkey - HcGxGrill
State.Description: A small mod thats adds the .32 Pistol into the levelled list so it will show up on NPCs alongside things like Pipe Pistols. This also adds a new ammo type but can be changed at a weapon workbench, it also comes with various mods and tints to make it look extra spicy!
State.Name: Capital Wasteland .32 Caliber Pistol

State.Author: TheFriedturkey - HcGxGrill
State.Description: A faithfully recreated brand new Classic 10mm Pistol to go along side the vanilla 10mm pistol, with full Levelled List intergration and a whole host of mods to add to it! We added all of the variants seen in 3 and its DLCs and also NV, along with mods from those games.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland 10mm Pistol

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcGxGrill
State.Description: The Auto Axe from Fallout 3's "The Pitt" DLC now in Fallout 4 for you to use! This was made by TheFriedturkey and HcG x Grill and is a scratch recreation of the Auto Axe found in Fallout 3, it comes fit with skins, mods and new animations.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Auto Axe

State.Author: HcG x Grill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: The sixth release on the roadmap, this is the behemoth mod it is only a simple addon to the existing behemoths to spice stuff up a bit
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Behemoths

Original.Name: Capital Wasteland Bobbleheads and Mojave Snow Globes (Vault 111)-58554-1-1-1646485208.rar

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: This mod adds in higher quality artwork for the Vault Boy bobbleheads that bobble. This also adds in Vault Girl bobbleheads which will show up in place of the vanilla ones depending on the players gender (tweakable in holotape). Not just that but we also added back in the Fallout New Vegas snow globes dotted around the commonwealth and much more!
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Bobbleheads and Mojave Snow Globes

State.Author: HcGxGrill - TheFriedTurkey
State.Description: The Brotherhood has a new look for their scribes well I say new more like classic! This mod replaces the scribe robes with the ones found in in Fallout 3 and New Vegas. This also adds Elder Lyons robes found in one of the rooms in the Prydwen the scribe robes have 3 different texture variants.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Brotherhood Outfits

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: Possibly the most grotesque creature mod for Fallout 4, the Capital Wasteland Centaurs. Adds back in those disgusting abominations from Fallout 3 and NV in the form of the standard centaur and evolved centaur plus a whole load of new variants. This mod adds the classic centaurs alongside the Fallout 4 mutant hounds.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Centaurs

State.Author: TheFriedturkey - HcGxGrill
State.Description: Our 5th stop on the roadmap, another small but cool mod, Dogmeat III! One of the offspring of Dogmeat you know and love has made his way down to Boston, known as Dogmeat III (the third) he is a new companion you can take on the road with you for your adventures, or just to leave at Sanctuary to guard your home!
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Dogmeat

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcGxGrill
State.Description: This mod adds a brand new Classic Gauss rifle to go along side the vanilla Gauss Rifles, with full Levelled List integration and brand new legendary, one is purchasable from Commonwealth weaponry and the other is in the cockpit of Skylanes Flight 1981.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Gauss Rifle

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcG x Grill
State.Description: This mod adds a brand new Classic Hunting rifle to go along side the vanilla Hunting Rifles, with full Levelled List integration and a whole host of mods to add to it!
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Hunting Rifle

State.Author: HcG x Grill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: This adds the style of molerat found in the capital wasteland and the mojave along side their Boston counterparts, once again our main goal is to complement the existing creatures with a bit of variety to spice things up for you playthroughs.
State.Name: DC Molerats

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcGxGrill
State.Description: This mod adds the classic look of Mysterious Stranger from Fallout 3 & New Vegas. This mod is simply a replacer of the existing mysterious stranger in Fallout 4.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Mysterious Stranger

State.Author: HcG x Grill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: The third release on the road map is finally here adding new gear for you and your settlers.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Outfit Pack

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcGxGrill
State.Description: This mod is the massive collection of various different outfits we have created for The Capital Wasteland project, these are all hand crafted faithful recreations of the Fallout 3 outfits worked on over the past couple of years. Included in this pack is around 50 Armour/Clothing items, with a fair amount of them being uniques you can find.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Outfit Pack Part II

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcGxGrill
State.Description: This mod adds in the classic look of the Radscorpions from Fallout 3 and NV alongside the existing ones, this includes the basic blue Radscorpion, albino and glowing which all looks closer to their Fallout 3 and NV counter parts. Pretty much does exactly as it says on the tin.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Radscorpions

State.Author: DogtoothCG - TheFriedturkey - HcGxGrill
State.Description: The Raiders have teamed up with their Commonwealth counterparts to reak havoc in style... well psycho style anyway. They can be found spawning alongside any other raider and spawn with a brand new look!
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Raider Pack

Original.Name: Capital Wasteland Robot Pack Main Files-52147-1-1621287396.rar

State.Author: HcGxGrill - TheFriedturkey
State.Description: This mod adds in 4 New robots to the Automatron DLC, being the Classic Mister Handy & Gutsy, Classic Protectron, Classic eyebots and Securitrons, all based off their Fallout 3 and New Vegas designs. The Securitron is a brand new robot to Fallout 4 and has a fully new custom skeleton, animations and artwork.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Robot Pack

State.Author: HcGxGrill - TheFriedTurkey
State.Description:
This is a full new workshop pack containing tons of new furniture, workshop items and two brand new building kits.

The pack contains around 200 new placeable items!
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Workshop Pack

State.Author: TheFriedturkey - HcGxGrill
State.Description: Part 2 of the Capital Wasteland workshop pack, includes 100+ brand new custom placeable objects, the theme is really just a mixed bag of stuff from Fallout 3 and a few things from New Vegas.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Workshop Pack II

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcGxGrill
State.Description: This mod adds in the classic look of the Yao Guai from Fallout 3 alongside the Fallout 4 Yao Guai. This includes a standard, glowing and albino variant that will spawn in the world where Fallout 4 ones do. There is also a companion you can get which is east Wildwood Cemetery called Winnie, they are also a lot faster just like in Fallout 3.
State.Name: Capital Wasteland Yao Guai

State.Author: Neurolepticer
State.Description:
Cinematic Lensflares

Sun and Lights are affected.

Put Both Files Into Your Fallout 4 Data Folder And Activate The Plugin.
State.Name: Cinematic Lensflares

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: This mod adds in a remake of the brahmin from Fallout 3 & NV to Fallout 4 as a replacer, not really much else to it does what it says on the tin.
State.Name: Classic Brahmin Replacer

State.Author: TheFriedturkey
State.Description: Today I finally get to share my work for the Capital Wasteland project with the world. The ghouls from fallout 3 and New Vegas are something that i have been wanting to do for a very long time, recently i had the opportunity and took it.
State.Name: Fallout 3 - NV Feral Ghouls Replacer

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: This is a new and improved version of the old Classic Ghouls Replacer which now uses no work arounds! It all works as is with every outfit and it also comes with vastly improved facial morphs, remastered artwork and just overall more stability.
State.Name: Classic Ghouls Redux

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: This mod adds 11 new melee weapons from Fallout 3 & NV 2 of which are unique. Includes faithfully remade artwork for each weapon. They are all integrated seamlessly into the games levelled lists so they will appear on NPCs and in vendors. Some of them have new modifications on them aswell as existing Fallout 4 modifications.
State.Name: Classic Melee Pack

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: This mod adds 10 new unarmed weapons from Fallout 3 & NV 5 of which are unique and can be bought from vendors. They are all integrated seamlessly into the games levelled lists so they will appear on NPCs and in vendors. Includes faithfully remade artwork for each weapon.
State.Name: Classic Unarmed Pack

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Adds three different heights of craftable ladders that you and NPC's can climb in your settlements. All animated.
State.Name: Climbable Ladders for Settlements

State.Author: Bingle
State.Description: A script-free UI widget that shows your current body condition.
State.Name: Condition Boy - Now with Condition Girl

State.Author: FlashyJoeR
State.Description: Crime And Punishment is a game-wide systems mod that includes a fully customizable karma and crime system, replete with consequences. It also includes game play mechanics such as combat surrender, kidnappings, holdups, disguises, stealth takedowns, settlement repopulation and much more!
State.Name: Flashy(JoeR) - Crime And Punishment

State.Author: reg2k and Neanka
State.Description: The Extended Dialogue Interface removes the hardcoded 4-option limit on dialogue and adds full engine support for any number of player dialogue options.
State.Name: Extended Dialogue Interface

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Restore dungeon clear music, crossair focus sound, critical sound and workbench humming in a single mod.
State.Name: Cut SFX Restored

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

Original.Name: Damn Apocalypse - Loot Module - Miami Misadventures Patch-33812-1-0-1656714492.zip

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

Original.Name: Damn Apocalypse - Loot Module - Point Lookout Patch-33812-1-0-1656714414.zip

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: A modular survival overhaul, including a very in-depth loot and economy overhaul, a module for power armor scarcity and a lightweight combat plugin.
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse

State.Author: Payl0ad - Diacute
State.Description: A Variety of patches for Damn Apocalypse!
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse Patch Compendium - DiaEdit

State.Author: Payl0ad - Diacute
State.Description: A Variety of patches for Damn Apocalypse!
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse Patch Compendium - DiaEdit

State.Author: Payl0ad - Diacute
State.Description: A Variety of patches for Damn Apocalypse!
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse Patch Compendium - DiaEdit

State.Author: Payl0ad - Diacute
State.Description: A Variety of patches for Damn Apocalypse!
State.Name: Damn Apocalypse Patch Compendium - DiaEdit

Original.Name: DC and West Coast Supermutants v1-49680-1-1611693200.rar

State.Author: HcGxGrill - TheFriedTurkey
State.Description: They are back, and they have teamed up! This mod adds the DC variants of the supermutants also their West Coast ones aswell (Yes that also includes nightkin). This is only a small mod but just a little something to spice up your playthrough with some extra variety, these will fight alongside the existing Fallout 4 Institute Supermutants.
State.Name: DC and West Coast Supermutants

State.Author: Somhairle
State.Description: Adds 133 (and counting) new lore friendly songs to Diamond City Radio the right way - by adding them to the Diamond City Radio quest. No messy hacks and no impact on Travis' monologue.
State.Name: Diamond City Radio Extended

State.Author: Chrislor2882 - esteva2103
State.Description: Adds a .500 Nitro Express Double Barrel Rifle to the game. With custom models, textures and animations. With level list integration via scripts. .ESP as .ESL flagged. Includes support for Horizon,  Caliber Complex and Tactical Reload.
State.Name: Double Barrel Rifle

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Let's you dual wield some .44 magnums. Just take two .44's to a Chemistry bench. ESL available.
State.Name: Dual .44 Magnums

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: We all know the dangers of radiation, but with the right precautions, you CAN prevent accidental death or even -- eewww -- ghoulification - Three dog. This has never been more true, but now with this mod you actually run the risk of actually becoming a ghoul.
State.Name: Dynamic Ghoulification

State.Author: Anamorfus
State.Description: Enhanced Lights and FX has the goal to create a more atmospheric and realistic lighting. It overhauls the lights, effects, ambient light and creates a new mood for interiors.
State.Name: Enhanced Lights and FX

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: This mod allows you to have Dogmeat and a standard companion at the same time using in game functionality (not hacks or console commands).
State.Name: Everyone's Best Friend (Dogmeat and Companion At Same Time - No Console - No Hack)

Original.Name: Fallout 2287 - Gas Masks of the Wasteland-17491-1-0-8-2-1605303361.zip

State.Author: D1v1ne122
State.Description: Inspired by Metro 2033, this mod implements a new resource: gas mask filters. Humans are required to wear a gas mask while wandering the wasteland in exterior areas. Meanwhile gas masks consume filters that keep out harmful radioactive dust.
State.Name: Fallout 2287 - Gas Masks of the Wasteland

Original.Name: Fallout 2287 Gas Masks of the Wasteland - MCM Settings Menu-56710-1-0-3-1646830214.rar

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Full featured MCM settings menu for Fallout 2287 - Gas Masks of the Wasteland
State.Name: Fallout 2287 - Gas Masks of the Wasteland - MCM Settings Menu

State.Author: The Capital Wasteland Team
State.Description: Fallout 4: Point Lookout is a fan recreation of Fallout 3's Point Lookout DLC, fully realized in Fallout 4, including all quests and NPCs.
State.Name: Fallout 4 - Point Lookout

State.Author: The Capital Wasteland Team
State.Description: Fallout 4: Point Lookout is a fan recreation of Fallout 3's Point Lookout DLC, fully realized in Fallout 4, including all quests and NPCs.
State.Name: Fallout 4 - Point Lookout

State.Author: SpiderAkiraC
State.Description: Overhauled AI for Vanilla + Mod added citizen NPCs. Adds new custom idles and more behaviors to daily life.
State.Name: Fallout 4 AI Overhaul

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcG x Grill
State.Description: Adds the follower ED-E as a new companion to Fallout 4.
State.Name: Fallout New Vegas - ED-E Companion

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description:
Overhaul of the sleeping and waiting menu for Fallout 4. 

Directly click on your desired wake-up time with target time buttons. See the daylight level at target time in the daytime graph and more. Interface available in all languages.
State.Name: FallUI - Sleep and Wait

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Adds missing LODs for objects that don't currently have them. This improves visuals and eliminates pop-in of objects at no performance cost. Seriously no performance cost. See the compares yourself.
State.Name: Far Object LOD Improvement Project

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Simply adds arms to the first person running animations, open and closed hand styles available. Includes Power Armor. Archive, loose files, or empty ESL versions.
State.Name: First-Person Running with Hands Animations

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Simply adds arms to the first person swimming animations. Archive, loose files, or empty ESL available.
State.Name: First-Person Swimming Animations

State.Author: LarannKiar
State.Description: Turnes Salem into a thriving and bustling town. Recruitable NPCs, Player Homes, Romancable Character, Outdoor Radio System, Stars and Stripes Dress, Unique Merchants, Random Conversations and many more...
State.Name: Flourishing Salem - Overhaul

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Adds a photo mode to Fallout 4, accessible from the Pause menu or via hotkey.
State.Name: FO4 Photo Mode

State.Author: Seddon4494
State.Description: A substantial quest mod which adds a new town to the Commonwealth. Features ten main, thirty-six side quests, a fully-voiced player, over 5,000 lines of new dialogue, new set of collectable bobbleheads with perks, and plenty to explore and discover. Approximately 8-10 hours of new gameplay.
State.Name: Fourville

Original.Name: FOV Slider and Player Height - ESL version-36768-1-3-1585132456.zip

State.Author: g0kur
State.Description: Adjust FOVs/PlayerScale with sliders without messing up the Terminal Display and Pipboy.
State.Name: FOV Slider and Player Height

State.Author: HcG x Grill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: The fifth release on the roadmap, only a small one. This will add a new apparel item which is the ghoul mask from Fallout 4 Capital Wasteland along with a new miniquest on the creation of the mask
State.Name: Ghoul Mask

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Balances the environmental effects on all base game and DLC transparent material files.
State.Name: Gloomy Glass - All transparent materials revised

State.Author: FlashyJoer
State.Description: Gun For Hire allows you to open a business outside of Diamond City and to run never-ending jobs for clients from a base of 27 different archetypes.
State.Name: Flashy(JoeR) - Gun For Hire - Commonwealth Mercenary Jobs

State.Author: DeathByPewPew
State.Description: Gunner outfit replacer using DefaltTheFixer's "Gunner Outfit Pack," offering full leveled list integration with 57 new types of lore-friendly outfits combined with 125 accessories for 60,000+ gunner outfit combinations.
State.Name: Gunner Outfit Extreme Overhaul

State.Author: Defalt - Mavmanzero
State.Description: This adds 215 Gunner themed Outfits/Hats/Helmets/Masks (75 Outfits, 112 Hats/Helmets, 10 Masks, 11 Backpacks, 2 Goggles and 5 Standalone Kevlar armors) + Gunner themed Paint Jobs for the T-45, T-51, T-60 and X-01 Power Armors to the game.
State.Name: Gunner Outfit Pack (STANDALONE)

State.Author: Phlunder
State.Description: Vanilla-friendly retexture of all object LOD resources in the base game and DLCs.
State.Name: HD LOD Textures

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: HUDFramework is a UI framework that makes it possible for mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.
State.Name: HUDFramework

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Adds a new mechanic to gather meat, bones, skin and other materials from animals in a new immersive way.
State.Name: Hunter of the Commonwealth

State.Author: Hitman47101 - Ha-ru and friends
State.Description: Another take on the right-handed Hunting Rifle.
State.Name: Hunting Rifle Animation Replacer

State.Author: AnotherOne aka RetroPaladin - Octodecoy
State.Description: Not a little patch or addon, but full set of immersive ingestible animations.
State.Name: Immersive Animation Framework

State.Author: AnotherOne aka RetroPaladin - Octodecoy
State.Description: Not a little patch or addon, but full set of immersive ingestible animations.
State.Name: Immersive Animation Framework

State.Author: Aphest
State.Description: Fixes everything that was originally wrong with Dogmeat. Also removes his Max Level Limit. See details! Script-Free!
State.Name: Immersive Dogmeat - Smart - Silent - Sneaky

State.Author: HcG x Grill TheFriedturkey
State.Description: The fourth release on the road map, the centaurs. These are based off a fallout 4 scrapped concept art
State.Name: Institute Centaurs

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: Tired of your NPCs walking around the entire settlement? Trying to figure out why a simple staircase is such a conundrum? Are your plans for Jamaica Plain being modified just to keep your settlers inside the settlement? This is the mod for you! No longer will a pair of simple concrete staircases look like an impassible barrier!
State.Name: Jamaica Plain Pathfinding Fix

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Some ear candy when picking up items.
State.Name: Jolly Item Sounds

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: A Fallout 4 mod for people who like grabbing and scrapping things that aren't nailed down.
State.Name: Junkier Junk

State.Author: MrLameGaming
State.Description: Adds a new animation set for the laser rifle/pistol 1st person only
State.Name: Laser Rifle Reanimation

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled Bloatfly texture replacer. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Bloatfly

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled texture replacer for the Bloodrage Mirelurk that inhabits Far Harbour. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Bloodrage Mirelurk

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled Deathclaw texture replacer boasting the same file size as the HI-RES DLC textures they're based on, but greatly improved thanks to machine learning. All variants are covered.
State.Name: LC's UHD Deathclaw

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled Skeleton texture replacer boasting the same file size as the HI-RES DLC textures they're based on, but greatly improved thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Skeletons

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled texture replacer of the Fountain Statue. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Fountain Statue

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled Gatorclaw texture replacer boasting the same file size as the HI-RES DLC textures they're based on, but greatly improved thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Gatorclaw

Original.Name: LC's UHD Kirby Head Statue - 4k BA2 - 1.0-60897-1-1654005174.7z

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled texture replacer of the Kirby Head Statue that adorn Downtown Boston. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Kirby Head Statue

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled texture replacer for the Mirelurk King. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Mirelurk King

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled Mirelurk Queen and Mirelurk Hatchling texture replacer boasting the same file size as the HI-RES DLC textures they're based on, but greatly improved thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Mirelurk Queen

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled Mutant Hound texture replacer boasting the same file size as the HI-RES DLC textures they're based on, but greatly improved thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Mutant Hound

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled texture replacer of Pickman's unsettling paintings. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Pickman's Paintings

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled texture replacer for the Radroach. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Radroach

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description:
An upscaled wardrobe worn by skeletons. Dress up those old bones in some finer rags! 



Treat your dead to some sharper wear today, they're long overdue a wardrobe change.
State.Name: LC's UHD Skeleton Wardrobe

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled texture replacer for the Stingwing and all their variants. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Stingwing

State.Author: Thecrusader93
State.Description: An upscaled texture replacer of the Vault-Boy/Girl Statues featured in the Vault-Tec Workshop DLC. Boasting far sharper texture clarity and richer detail than vanilla thanks to machine learning.
State.Name: LC's UHD Vault-Tec Statues

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: This mod standardises Leveled Item forms, fixes bugs/inconsistencies and controls DLC item distribution. Comes with a configuration holotape and optional MCM.
State.Name: Leveled Item Framework (LIF)

State.Author: Expired6978
State.Description: Adds engine modifications to improve character creation.
State.Name: LooksMenu

State.Author: jkruse05
State.Description: A lore friendly weapon in 5.56 for each ballistic perk. The New Vegas Light Machine Gun, the R91, and a .223 pistol from the cancelled Black Isle Fallout 3.
State.Name: Lore Friendly 5.56 Collection (New Vegas LMG - R91 - Van Buren .223 Autoloader)

State.Author: Recluse
State.Description: Adds a good number of new male facial hair combinations. All done with ESP file only. Currently includes 100+ new facial hair choices.
State.Name: Lots More Facial Hair

State.Author: Recluse
State.Description: Makes a selection of male hairstyles available and adds a good number of new female combinations and hybrids. All done with ESP file only. Currently includes 100+ new hairstyles.
State.Name: Lots More Female Hairstyles

Original.Name: Lots More Male Hairstyles v. 1.21 - Fix-10695-1-21Fix.rar

State.Author: Recluse
State.Description: Adds a good number of new male hair combinations and hybrid hairstyles. All done with ESP file only. Currently includes ~150 new hairstyles.
State.Name: Lots More Male Hairstyles

State.Author: KhaoMaat
State.Description: Bad performance in the Institute? Don't want to remove all lights? Try this mod! Performance will be through the roof! Covers the concourse as well as adjacent locations. VR & pancake compatible.
State.Name: Lucid Institute - Performance Optimization - VR Compatible

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: The Complex Sorter from FallUI Item Sorter Mod. Automatically add item tags to all items. Highly versatile and completely configurable: custom processing rules, custom tag sets, custom naming rules. You can just change anything to your liking. Standard rules support most custom mods out-of-the-box.
State.Name: M8r98a4f2's Complex Item Sorter

State.Author: Skibadaa
State.Description: The best heavy weapons just got better, with two new contenders entering the fray. My machineguns; reborn!
State.Name: Machineguns Rebirth

State.Author: eclix
State.Description: A hardcore combat and medical overhaul which adds lethal headshots, wounds, bleeding, pain and 12 new medical items. Script free and highly compatible.
State.Name: MAIM - Wounds Bleeding Pain Meds and Headshots

State.Author: eclix
State.Description: A hardcore combat and medical overhaul which adds lethal headshots, wounds, bleeding, pain and 12 new medical items. Script free and highly compatible.
State.Name: MAIM - Wounds Bleeding Pain Meds and Headshots

State.Author: eclix
State.Description: A hardcore combat and medical overhaul which adds lethal headshots, wounds, bleeding, pain and 12 new medical items. Script free and highly compatible.
State.Name: MAIM - Wounds Bleeding Pain Meds and Headshots

State.Author: eclix and GELUXRUM
State.Description: Adjust your move speed in real time from 20% to 140% using hotkeys or your mouse scroll wheel. Adds several new movement mechanics.
State.Name: MAIM Speed - Scroll Wheel or Hot Key Controlled Movement Speed

State.Author: Gmoi and Stefan Engdahl
State.Description: Adds an early game shotgun that can be converted into an improvised explosive launcher. It is injected into the raider and gunner levelled list. Based on AsXas' pipe shotgun.
State.Name: Makeshift Shotgun and Improvised Grenade Launcher

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Reduces MCM loading time to nearly instant loading
State.Name: MCM Booster

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!
State.Name: MCM Settings Manager

State.Author: HcG x Grill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: The second milestone on the roadmap, Merc outfit pack includes 5 merc outfits and the sheriffs duster and hat.
State.Name: Merc Outfit Pack

State.Author: Fallout Miami Team
State.Description: Miami Misadventures is an episodic mod that provides a single platform for all standalone mod content released during the production of Fallout: Miami. It features new characters, quests, items and locations in the Commonwealth. Each episode is due to be released simultaneously on both PC and Xbox One.
State.Name: Miami Misadventures - Episode 1

Original.Name: Miniguns Rebirth v1.1b Main File ESL version-49721-v1-1b-1627466610.zip

State.Author: Skibadaa
State.Description: The OG Minigun pack for Fallout 4. Rebuilt from the ground up with new assets and features to bring it up to 2021 standards. This is REBIRTH.
State.Name: Miniguns Rebirth

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: Bighorners are back and they have made their way to the Commonwealth. Watch out for these woolly bullies since they if they get you, they might just knock you down. They can be found all over the Commonwealth spawning alongside Radstags, they can also be a great addition to your settlements.
State.Name: Mojave Bighorners

State.Author: HcGxGrill and TheFriedturkey
State.Description: This adds the dreaded Cazadores from Fallout New Vegas into Fallout 4, now you can experience the pain of these swift creatures in Commonwealth!
State.Name: Mojave Cazadores

State.Author: TheFriedturkey - HcGxGrill
State.Description: This is a new fully custom creature remaking the Geckos found in Fallout New Vegas with a brand new custom skeleton, artwork and faithfully recreated animations. This also comes with 2 new outfits (the leather armour and lightweight leather armour), 1 new weapon being a Cattle Prod with some extra mods, 3 new hats and more!
State.Name: Mojave Geckos

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcG x Grill
State.Description: This mod adds a completely new creature to the Commonwealth in the form of the Mantises from Fallout New Vegas. This is a completely new custom creature with a brand new skeleton and animation set faithfully recreated.
State.Name: Mojave Mantises

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcGxGrill
State.Description: This mod adds in loads of new NCR outfits from Fallout New Vegas and its DLCs, these can be found at vendors like Falons basement. You can buy both the armours and plans to craft them a the chemistry workbench. In this pack we include NCR Trooper outfits, NCR Ranger and Riot Outfits as well as casual NCR outfits.
State.Name: NCR Outfit Pack

State.Author: TheL0neW0nder
State.Description: Adds some of the New Vegas companions into Fallout 4.
State.Name: New Vegas Companions

State.Author: Crouching OVME
State.Description: Adjusts NPC accuracy based on the type of enemy and the Faction they belong to. No more being sniped by a Bloatfly!
State.Name: NPC Accuracy Revised

State.Author: Systoliker
State.Description:
One of the main concerns from players of the "Nuka-World" DLC was 

that as a good Player, there isn't much to do in Nuka-World after completing the quest, "open season". I 

want to change that!
State.Name: Nuka World Plus

State.Author: CADAVVER
State.Description: This mod adds the NZ-41 rifle aka Charlton Automatic Rifle to Fallout 4 with lots of customization, Leveled List and Side Aim support.
State.Name: NZ-41 - Automatic Rifle

State.Author: CADAVVER
State.Description: This mod adds the NZ-41 rifle aka Charlton Automatic Rifle to Fallout 4 with lots of customization, Leveled List and Side Aim support.
State.Name: NZ-41 - Automatic Rifle

State.Author: CADAVVER
State.Description: This mod adds the NZ-41 rifle aka Charlton Automatic Rifle to Fallout 4 with lots of customization, Leveled List and Side Aim support.
State.Name: NZ-41 - Automatic Rifle

State.Author: jaggedjosh
State.Description: A fully voiced lore-friendly quest mod featuring a new worldspace, player home, unique weapon, new armor and companion. The Sole Survivor must help a religious wastelander from the West.
State.Name: Old Time Religion

Original.Name: People Live In - Dark Hollow Pond-60329-1-00-1652137867.zip

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: People live here, why does it feel abandoned?
State.Name: People Live In - Dark Hollow Pond

Original.Name: People Live in - Roadside Pines Motel-60711-1-00-1661523605.zip

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: People live here, why does it feel abandoned?
State.Name: People Live In - Roadside Pines Motel

Original.Name: People Live In - USAF Satellite Station Olivia-59993-1-01-1651292746.zip

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: People live here, why does it feel abandoned?
State.Name: People Live In - USAF Satellite Station Olivia

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: People live here, why does it feel abandoned?
State.Name: People Live In - USAF Satellite Station Olivia

State.Author: -TheDogOfWar
State.Description: A small cabin that has its own underground bunker. The cabin is situated on the edge of a tranquil, yet eerie pineforest, far beyond the western borders of the commonwealth. It has a tiny camp/settlement, so mass building is not advised.
State.Name: Pineneedle Rest - Player Home

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcG x Grill
State.Description: A brand new replacer for the pipboy, to look more like the Fallout 3/NV Pip-Boy 3000A.
State.Name: Pip-Boy 3000A

Original.Name: Project Mojave - Main Files (Early Access v0.2)-55215-0-2-1636736894.rar

State.Author: TheFriedturkey - HcGxGrill - C411um13 - MrColonelMustard
State.Description: Project Mojave is a passion project we have worked on the past 4 months﻿ we have poured many many hours into making this and hopefully it shows, this is by no means a finished product but it will give you something to play and enjoy as we work on this little side project.
State.Name: Project Mojave

State.Author: TheFriedturkey and HcGxGrill
State.Description: This mod adds 26 new clothing items from NV (some are new or from 76 which are used in PM). They are all integrated seamlessly into the games levelled lists so they will appear on NPCs and in vendors. Includes faithfully remade artwork for each clothing item.
State.Name: Project Mojave Outfit Pack

State.Author: GrilledTurkey
State.Description: This mod adds in loads of new workshop items for your settlement all themed around setdressing found in Fallout New Vegas! There is everything from a trailer, to chairs and even foliage, including stuff like palm trees, plants, and cactuses to harvest. Not to mention a whole lot of new decorations to really give your settlement the Mojave feel!
State.Name: Project Mojave Workshop Pack

State.Author: HcGxGrill - TheFriedturkey - Zanthir - MrColonelMustard
State.Description: Project Zeta is a little project we have made based on Mothership Zeta and Invaders from Beyond, This mod adds a load of new workshop constructibles, 3 New weapons (3 uniques aswell), 1 new outfit, one new companion, two new enemy types as well as two new workshops.
State.Name: Project Zeta

State.Author: Fallout Miami Team
State.Description: Quad-Barrel Shotgun is a standalone release of a weapon made for the in-development mod Fallout: Miami. It adds a new shotgun to the game based on the Winchester Liberator as well as a short quest to obtain a unique version of the weapon.
State.Name: Quad-Barrel Shotgun - Fallout Miami Standalone

State.Author: Crimson Knight
State.Description: Adds Quantum Storms from Fallout 76's Fallout Worlds mode to Nuka-World.
State.Name: Quantum Storms for Nuka-World

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: Quicktrade with vendors and settlers.
State.Name: QuickTrade

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: A simple framework that allows mod authors to safely use the base game's random encounter story manager.
State.Name: Random Encounter Framework

State.Author: jkruse05 with assets from Ha_ru - Navarro - and ngabber
State.Description: The classic hunting rifle from Fallout 1, 2, and Tactics returns... again. This is an overhaul of my old mod, and includes loads of improvements.
State.Name: Rangemaster Remaster (Classic Hunting Rifle)

State.Author: IceKK
State.Description: Disabled Mouse Acceleration, Horizontal/Vertical Parity, Scalable ADS Multiplier, Normalized Sensitivity
State.Name: RAW INPUT - The Ultimate Mouse Sensitivity Fix

State.Author: Steven Janes and Bwones
State.Description: Adds a Recharger Gun to the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Recharger Gun

State.Author: Steven Janes and Bwones
State.Description: Adds a Recharger Gun to the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Recharger Gun

Original.Name: Rifles Rebirth Main File (ESP version) v1.0a-61325-1-0a-1656439308.zip

State.Author: Skibadaa
State.Description: The long awaited rifle pack has arrived. 6 Guns, 6 months of work. This is Rifles Rebirth
State.Name: Rifles Rebirth

State.Author: Antistar - Hitman47101 - Ha_ru
State.Description: Flips the charging handle on the Handmade Rifle to the right side. Custom animations and sounds included.
State.Name: Right-handed Nukaworld AK Replacer

State.Author: Ryn
State.Description: A WIP overhaul of Fallout 4's map, changing locations to be more immersive and interesting, allowing more replayability.
State.Name: Ryn's Fallout 4

State.Author: GELUXRUM
State.Description: SCOURGE is a stat overhaul that removes scaling and standardises stats. It uses a real-world math model to create a Commonwealth in which no two creatures are the same through MCM-configurable randomisation.
State.Name: SCOURGE - Unleveled and Standardised NPC Stats

State.Author: GELUXRUM
State.Description: SCOURGE is a stat overhaul that removes scaling and standardises stats. It uses a real-world math model to create a Commonwealth in which no two creatures are the same through MCM-configurable randomisation.

State.Author: henkspamadres
State.Description: Adds see-through (so no scope overlay) Combat Scopes to various weapons.
State.Name: See Through Scopes

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: The Screaming Eagle from 76 remade for Fallout 4 but with its own animations and several customization options, try out the burst fire. ESL available.
State.Name: Select Assault Rifle

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Adds an all new custom animated Fallout friendly sniper rifle to the game, complete with all power armor animations and various cosmetic customizations.
State.Name: Select Marksman Rifle

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Adds an all new custom animated Fallout friendly submachine gun to the game, complete with all power armor animations and various cosmetic customizations.
State.Name: Select Rapid Machinegun

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Adds an all new custom animated Fallout friendly Revolver to the game, complete with all power armor animations and various cosmetic customizations. Now with Double Action! :D
State.Name: Select Revolver

State.Author: Sharlikran
State.Description: Settlement Keywords expands on the current Settlement Menu system offering mod authors even more categories to use for their mods.
State.Name: Settlement Keywords Expanded

State.Author: Kris Takahashi
State.Description:
The Tales from the Commonwealth mod adds quests and companions. 

The Atomic Radio mod adds a radio station. 

The Settlers of the Commonwealth mod adds settlers with interesting dialogue.  



Go to 3dnpc.com for details.
State.Name: Atomic Radio and Tales from the Commonwealth

State.Author: PK0
State.Description: Sets the distance of the shadows dynamically (F4SE)
State.Name: Shadow Boost FO4

State.Author: Hedied
State.Description: Adds actual gun shot reverbs which makes a big difference when shooting in interior.
State.Name: _Sound Zero_

State.Author: Baerthe Cryptdick Carnagefiend HaplessAccreditation
State.Description: Enhancing the Glowing Sea and Quincy Marshes, with new enemies, locations, and rewards.

State.Author: Whisper
State.Description: Adds 13 standalone custom workbenches to the Settlement build-menu. Designed as a modder's resource, used by my Craft Power Armor, Crafting Rearranged and Shipments Expanded mods.
State.Name: Standalone Workbenches

State.Author: TinyManticore - Dashboarderian
State.Description: A Continuation of the 'Start Me Up' mod. Bug Fixes, Tweaks and Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch Compatibility.
State.Name: Start Me Up Redux - Bug Fixes - Tweaks - plus UFO4P Compatibility

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Features a brand new eat and drink system, which relies on weight of the item instead of the caps value and allows you to control it.

In addition to that, you can tweak many aspects of the survival added features. Like tweaking disease chance, disabling Adrenaline. Choose how long you can maximally sleep on the different bet types.

And mo
State.Name: Survival Configuration Menu

State.Author: Kris Takahashi
State.Description:
The Tales from the Commonwealth mod adds quests and companions. 

The Atomic Radio mod adds a radio station. 

The Settlers of the Commonwealth mod adds settlers with interesting dialogue.  



Go to 3dnpc.com for details.
State.Name: Atomic Radio and Tales from the Commonwealth

State.Author: Gmoi
State.Description:
Adds a modular electromagnetic pistol (with optional foregrips and stocks).

Custom animations, sounds, models and textures. Injected into levelled lists.
State.Name: The Charger Pistol - a Gauss based weapon platform

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: The Juger Pistols. You can use them as a singular pistol, or dual wield them. ESL available.
State.Name: The Juger Pistols

State.Author: dpillari
State.Description: high definition  remodels and repainting of all nuka cola variants within fallout 4, and its expansion Nuka world. mixes included. the aim being to make the bottles look more natural, and similar to their concept art. also they are now 3d with liquid inside. in 4k, 2k and 1 k varieties.
State.Name: The Nuka Project

State.Author: 84Cronos
State.Description: Travel from the Sanctuary Red Rocket station to Concord and help a strange Mr. Handy to gain access to your small and lore friendly hideout in Concord. This player home comes with all the necessary crafting stations as well as plenty of storage and a few interactive objects.
State.Name: The Way Home 1 - Concord Hideout

State.Author: Gmoi
State.Description:
Adds a modular laser rifle, pistol, submachine gun, sniper, flamethrower or shotgun. 

Custom animations, sounds, models and textures. Injected into levelled lists.

Includes 3 craftable Zap Gun turrets.
State.Name: The Zap Gun - a makeshift laser weapon

State.Author: Antistar
State.Description: The vanilla SMG's art assets aren't very good! This mod replaces them with something much more true-to-life to the real-world Thompson SMG. New models, textures and animations.
State.Name: Thompson SMG Replacer

State.Author: CrEaToXx
State.Description: This combines all of my previous snaptastic mesh replacers, allowing for a wide range of additional workshop building snapping convenience...
State.Name: Total Snapgasm

State.Author: bLaCkShAd0w
State.Description: Underground Hideout - A medium sized oldschool player home heavily inspired by the two mods for Fallout 3 and Fallout:NV by danthegeek. This is my take on this timeless mod, with a new look and layout while still having all the classic features we all remember.
State.Name: Underground Hideout

State.Author: bLaCkShAd0w
State.Description: Underground Hideout - A medium sized oldschool player home heavily inspired by the two mods for Fallout 3 and Fallout:NV by danthegeek. This is my take on this timeless mod, with a new look and layout while still having all the classic features we all remember.
State.Name: Underground Hideout

State.Author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

State.Author: DeadPool2099 - Ha_Ru and friends
State.Description: This mod will add Wattz 3000 laser rifle, with all-new lore-friendly design, featuring custom animations, models and textures, inspired by famous Wattz 2000 from Fallout and Fallout 2
State.Name: Wattz Laser Gun

State.Author: OldManDan
State.Description: This mod adds power armor 3rd person reload animations, and fixes the quick-step bug with power armor.
State.Name: Wattz Laser Gun Animation Fixes

State.Author: ossumpossum
State.Description: Flags water at the Weston Water Treatment Plant with IsFullLOD so it is visible and no longer pops in.
State.Name: Weston Water LOD Fix

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: MaxvonBehr
State.Description: The Wide Wasteland Warehouse (WWW) aims to add to the Commonwealth a plethora of new guns, armors and props to breathe new life into the Boston Wasteland, with lore-friendly arms and armour made with plausible manufacturing methods and design philosophies that fits into the post-apocalyptic reality of the Fallout setting.
State.Name: WWW - The Wasteland Wide Warehouse Project - Valve Handgun

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: Adds a proper progression to the Minutemen via patrols between your settlements. Defend the commonwealth against raiders and monsters alike, with the help of the minutemen!
State.Name: You and What Army - More Minutemen Patrols

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: ClearanceClarence
State.Description: An 8K retexture of the Power Armor Stations. Also available in 4K and 2K
State.Name: CC's FUHD Power Armor Stations

State.Author: ClearanceClarence
State.Description: And 8K retexture for Liberty Prime with focus on smaller details. Also available in 4K and 2K
State.Name: CC's Liberty Prime

State.Author: ClearanceClarence
State.Description: A simple retexture of the APC's seen around the wasteland
State.Name: CC's UHD APC

State.Author: ClearanceClarence
State.Description: A simple retexture of the UFO
State.Name: CC's UHD UFO

State.Author: ClearanceClarence
State.Description: A simple and vanilla friendly retexture of the vertibirds in the game
State.Name: CC's Vertibirds

Original.Name: Fallout 76 Loading Styles for Fallout 4 v3-56567-1-0-1640565113.7z

State.Author: Locotero
State.Description:
Данный мод заменяет стандартный экран загрузки, на новый.



This mod replaces the standard loading screen with a new one.
State.Name: Fallout76 loading styles for Fallout4

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A whole new icon library with many fancy icons for usage in the FallUI mods. Including many customization settings.
State.Name: FallUI - Icon Library

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Overhaul of the Fallout 4 map. Added list of locations and workshops including text search. Add favorite locations to fast travel with one click. Many Quality-Of-Life features like disabling the popup on empty map space click, better map zoom steps, travel and arrival time. Colored marker support. Including high-res map texture support.
State.Name: FallUI - Map

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Better workbench interface optimized for PC. Bigger display size. Data columns. Comparision columns for mods. Item icon tag support. Icon menu for choosing your icon tag. Item subtitles. Autobuilding modules with zero cost. All languages included.
State.Name: FallUI - Workbench

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: new LevelUpMenu which also allow to add brand new perks into game, remove any classic perks and even add skills system into game
State.Name: LevelUpMenuEx

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

Original.Name: 5. xSE PluginPreloader settings for Mod Organizer 2-49866-0-2-5-1-1637459612.rar

State.Author: Sight1
State.Description: Guide prepared to improve Fallout 4 performance, including mod list, ini settings, tweaks, and installation instructions.
State.Name: Performance optimization guide - mod list and tweaks

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: framework which allow to add different new tabs into pipboy to track any actor values or global variables
State.Name: PipboyTabs

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Two main menus to set you in the mood
State.Name: Point Lookout - Main Menu - A Tribute

Original.Name: Ultra Quality God Rays Performance Fix-15211-1-0.7z

State.Author: SloppyPooBag
State.Description: This is just a batch file that changes the numeric values that the godrays use. Basically it just means you can use the ultra quality god rays without the huge performance hit. Performance should be roughly the same as using the low quality god rays.
State.Name: Ultra Quality God Rays Performance Fix

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description:
A F4SE plugin that allows you to disable the hardcoded, vision-obscuring shader effect at various workbenches so you can actually see what you're crafting.



Also allows you to change the shader effect for the Power Armor station and robot workbenches to a outline-only shader instead of a full shader.
State.Name: Crafting Highlight Fix

State.Author: FlashyJoeR
State.Description: Crime And Punishment is a game-wide systems mod that includes a fully customizable karma and crime system, replete with consequences. It also includes game play mechanics such as combat surrender, kidnappings, holdups, disguises, stealth takedowns, settlement repopulation and much more!
State.Name: Flashy(JoeR) - Crime And Punishment

State.Author: Ea6t
State.Description: Allows encounter zone levels to be recalculated after initial entry.
State.Name: Encounter Zone Recalculation (Continuous Level Scaling)

State.Author: boring3
State.Description:
Make Fallout 4 always take most of CPU usage

Increase FPS and Prevent suddenly lag caused by other processes
State.Name: Fallout Priority - f4se plugin
